pageContext.claim: “Trillions and trillions of dollars. Numbers that nobody would believe. Numbers, if I would have said it on the campaign trail, I would've been -- I would've been excoriated by the fake media. Excoriated.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to the market value of the U.S. stock market. It had gained trillions of dollars in the Obama administration -- at a time when Trump kept claiming stocks would soon crash.
